# Project context

- This repository contains terraform code that describes the infrastructure for a register of landlords and properties in the private rented sector in England.
- The application is containerised using Docker and deployed to AWS using ECS Fargate. Images are pushed to ECR from the CI/CD pipeline of a different repository.

# Asking Instructions for GitHub Copilot

- Always read the `personal-copilot-instructions.md` file and follow the instructions there in preference to those in this file.

# Agent Instructions

- Always read the `personal-copilot-instructions.md` file and follow the instructions there in preference to those in this file.
